snippet: It remains to be seen whether optimism in the face of negatives like high unemployment is rooted in complacency or a belief that the worst is over.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column on return of investor confidence in Europe; says survey of investor sentiment in euro zone shows move into positive territory for first time since summer of 2011, but it remains to be seen whether optimism is rooted in complacency or belief that worst is over.
lead_paragraph: It remains to be seen whether optimism in the face of negatives like high unemployment is rooted in complacency or a belief that the worst is over.

headline.print_headline: Investors in Europe See a Glass Half Full and Rising
headline.main: Investors in Europe See a Glass Half Full and Rising
